Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbal Forums!

I've been enjoying Kerbal Space Program for at least 2 weeks now, launching rockets, horrible plane designs, and adhoc orbital debris removing missions with stock parts (successful!) and am preparing to dive into the modding scene.

A little later I intend to upload a utility I created to help rearrange the parts list in the editor, but for now, I'd just like to say hello and get my first post on.

-JG
